entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
